ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed this also, being a woodelf bard my forage raised to 51. I am very pleased as I have got into a habit of pressing forage all the time, the higher the
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed this also, being a woodelf bard my forage raised to 51. I am very
pleased as I have got into a habit of pressing forage all the time, the
higher the skill the more food I'm gonna have =)
I only managed to raise the skill to 51 so not sure what it caps at, I'm
hoping something like 75-80 (100 would be nice). I wonder now if they
raised any other skill caps in yesterdays patch.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 42 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server

Ps, Lost a roll on a sash last night, out of the classes that were in the
group (bard, ranger, monk, wizard, cleric and druid). The wizard won
<sigh>. I rolled a lousy 23 and the wizard got 83.





"Corey de Danann" <corey@...> on 29/03/2000 22:08:21

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Forage gets better!




From: "Corey de Danann" <corey@...>

Hey all! Good news for those us who like the Forage skill! I was happily
running along today hitting my forage button as I always do, when I go the
message: You have become better at Forage (41). Yippeee. They have raised
the skill cap on forage. I had to log out before I found out what the max
was, but I thought I'd pass that along to you all.


Llyrean Daoine'Sidhe
Bard of the 23rd Ballad, on E'ci
